alert.note: Alert for Kahoolawe; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; South Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 24 at 3:37AM HST until February 24 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF MAUI COUNTY AND NORTH BIG ISLAND... .A strong high pressure system far north of Hawaii will produce strong trade winds and gusts through Friday. These strong winds may continue into Saturday. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Kahoolawe, Lanai and Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to drive, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
